info.title: Insight Contract Intelligence API
info.description:
## Overview

The Insight Contract Intelligence API provides access to government and commercial contracting
opportunities, contract management, and business intelligence features.

## Authentication

All API endpoints (except `/auth/*`) require a valid JWT token in the
`Authorization` header:

```
Authorization: Bearer <your-jwt-token>
```

## Rate Limiting

- General API: 100 requests/minute
- Authentication endpoints: 10 requests/minute
- Export endpoints: 5 requests/minute

## Error Handling

All errors follow a consistent format:

```json
{
  "error": "ERROR_CODE",
  "message": "Human-readable message",
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
  "path": "/resource"
}
```

## Pagination

List endpoints support pagination with `page` and `size` parameters.
Response includes `totalElements`, `totalPages`, and `number` (current page).

tags.name: Dashboards (System)
tags.description: System-level: Custom dashboard management. Used in both Face One (Contract Intelligence) and Face Two (Portal) for creating custom analytics dashboards.

tags.name: Onboarding (Face Two)
tags.description: Face Two (Portal): Client onboarding wizard. Multi-step workflow for new clients to set up their portal access and contract tracking.

tags.name: Pipeline (Face One)
tags.description: Face One (Contract Intelligence): Opportunity pipeline management for internal BD team. Tracks opportunities through bid stages (qualify, pursue, bid, award).

tags.name: Usage
tags.description: Usage tracking and metered billing APIs

tags.name: AI Analysis
tags.description: AI-powered analysis. Currently: Face One (opportunity summaries). Future: Face Two (contract intake analysis).

tags.name: Search (Face One)
tags.description: Face One (Contract Intelligence): Enhanced Elasticsearch search with facets, suggestions, and autocomplete for opportunity discovery.

put.description: Mark an onboarding step as complete

post.description: Upload a file directly to S3. Best for files under 10MB.
Confirm that a presigned upload has completed successfully

400.description: File not in pending state or not found in S3

post.description: Get a presigned URL for uploading large files directly to S3

get.description: Returns daily usage totals for a metric over a number of days

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to look back (default 30)

get.description: Returns usage summary for a specific billing period
Returns current usage limits and whether they have been exceeded
Returns paginated usage history for a date range
